Methods of Historic Interest (Early, Landmark Research)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Raising/Training Methods: Methods of Historic Interest (Early, Landmark Research)
This section is an archive of older methods that were revolutionary in their day,
but have since outlived their usefulness.
The first 5 were all created before we had any information on items values,
the lifespan index, stress and fatigue, etc.
The last method is Split Infinities first work on the truly landmark banana method.
His work continued with a more polished document in the regular Methods section.
  • How do you ppl do it.......... (WildCard's infamous method) April 18 - 01:34 am

  • Advanced Raising Method For Optimum Results - Version 1.0 April 22 - 05:38 am

  • RNA's Advanced Raising Method For Optimum Results - Version 4.0 July 22 - 11:53 pm

  • Azn-beast's fabled training method December 28 - 01:07 pm

  • The Much Much Better Method April 23 - 02:54 am

  • Eagle Fierce, How do you get your Pixies to live so long? June 27 - 03:27 pm

  • Split Infinities Method/Living Infinitely June 1 - 03:38 pm
